effect.sword-shield: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.

effect.legends-arceus: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.

short_effect.sword-shield: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.
short_effect.the-isle-of-armor: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.
short_effect.the-crown-tundra: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.

flavor_text.sword-shield: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status conditions to the target.
